name: HiloWords
description:
HiloWords is a word-lovers, Wordle-genre puzzle with a little more bite. In Hilowords, try to guess our word. For each letter in your guess, you'll be told if the target letter was higher or lower in the alphabet.

Comes with a stack of quality-of-life features including:

  • Universal daily puzzles (can be played without Internet connection)
  • Share button to copy your results and send to friends
  • Color-blind friendly
  • Unlimited practice/free play with stats collection
  • Puzzle save (start a puzzle and come back where you left off)
  • Mouse & keyboard functionality
  • Hand-crafted word list from New York Times published crossword writer Dr. Alex Bajcz
  • Statistics tracking
  • Option to reset all local save & stats (during any puzzle, press and hold control + alt + shift + home)
  • Much waow: dynamic screen resizing!

We think it's fun, and we hope you do, too!
